channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Government Support in the Solar and Wind Value Chains
item.description: Government Support in the Solar and Wind Value Chains by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 15 January 2025 at 0:00.

item.description: Measuring Carbon Footprints of Agri-Food Products - Eight Building Blocks by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Monday 17 February 2025 at 0:00.
